skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: w. r. t. a. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Talk Radio 98.5 FM and 1240 AM WRTA is Blair County’s local news authority and home to the highest rated radio programming in the country. WRTA is home to favorites like Wendy Bell, Clay Travis & Buck Sexton, Brian Kilmeade, Ben Shapiro, Joe Pags, and more. As well as local talents Cory Giger, Doug Herendeen, Referee Rich, Dave Shannon and more. WRTA is also the flagship station of the Altoona Curve, and many local sports.
